name: Nuclear Custodian
description:
Welcome to your new job for the day: a nuclear custodian! In Space! That's right, THE Outer Space!

With this new employment opportunity, expect to:

  • Shoot fast from your cozy ship (shoot too much & you're fired though)
  • Warp around short distances to get to where you need to be
  • Not explode!

BONUS FEATURE FOR SUPER PLAYERS: there is a pause function!

SPECIAL TIP: to really get into the action, start Infinite mode at 1.2 seconds between spawns. Quite fun, if I do say so myself.

(As for the actual gameplay, think of it like action Tetris. Junk flies at you, you shoot it, repeat. Add speed for infinite mode, add strategy(?) for levels mode.)

Anyways, seriously for a moment - this is my first full video game. Donezo, maybe an update. But don't put too much stake in that. But do expect my gratitude for trying it out - thank you so, so much for checking this out.

If you have any comments, please feel free to leave them. I'd love to hear any suggestions and if the game actually works for anyone else. Thank you.
